title: Analyze Preclinical Study Data
description: A research scientist needs to analyze the results from an in vivo preclinical study to determine the efficacy of a new compound.

tasks.description: Import the study data from the Electronic Lab Notebook (ELN).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully imports the raw data, including dosage groups and biomarker measurements.

tasks.description: Perform statistical analysis to compare the treatment groups to the control group.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly performs a t-test or ANOVA and calculates p-values.
Agent creates a chart showing the relationship between drug dosage and efficacy.

tasks.description: Summarize the findings in a draft report.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a summary stating that the compound showed a statistically significant effect at a specific dose.
